articles.title: Dr. STONE (French Dub) - Episode 14 - Master of Flame
articles.description: The Grand Bout is on. The kingdom of science must defeat Magma and take the seat of the village chief in order to give Ruri the antibiotic and win over the village.

articles.title: Dr. STONE (French Dub) - Episode 13 - Masked Warrior
articles.description: All that’s needed to make antibiotics is alcohol. The best way to get some is to win the Grand Bout, which the Senku and his kingdom will also need to do in order to keep Magma away from Ruri and give her the drug.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 34 - Opening
articles.description: As the Scouts rally and charge in pursuit, Reiner loses sight of his real personality while him and the others are trapped in the giant forest until nightfall.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 46 - Ruler of the Walls
articles.description: Desperate to stop the approaching monstrosity, the Scouts resort to unconventional tactics before it destroys everything in its path.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 27 - I'm Home
articles.description: With the appearance of Titans within Wall Rose, Sasha and Conny ride as messengers to warn their villages of the impending threat.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 28 - Southwestward
articles.description: The Scouts search for a hole in the wall while Eren and the others learn that someone close may be hiding all the answers.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 44 - Wish
articles.description: As battle breaks out to prevent the ritual, Historia makes a shocking decision which leads to catastrophe.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 36 - Charge
articles.description: While the recruits attempt to reason with Bertholdt, Commander Erwin charges forth in a desperate strategy to topple the Armored Titan.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 58 - Attack Titan
articles.description: Eren learns how all paths connect in the story that his father began. If Grisha is to pay for his sins, he must fight for freedom and take a stand.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 55 - Midnight Sun
articles.description: While picking up the pieces from the costly battle, tensions rise when deciding which of the wounded Scouts to use the single syringe on.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 53 - Perfect Game
articles.description: While one front in the battle is rained on by flames, the other is battered by boulders. With no way out, the Scouts are forced to fight or die trying.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 50 - The Town Where Everything Began
articles.description: The operation to retake Wall Maria commences in Shiganshina, the town where everything began. But when the Scouts arrive, something seems very wrong.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 49 - Night of the Battle to Retake the Wall
articles.description: The Scouts gather for a feisty feast before leaving to retake Wall Maria to uncover what's hidden in the basement once and for all.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 45 - Outside the Walls of Orvud District
articles.description: When everything falls apart, Eren must believe in himself to save his friends. But Eren alone may not be enough to stop the impending doom.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 41 - Trust
articles.description: On the run and running out of time, the Scouts must entrust their lives to others if they plan on surviving.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 30 - Historia
articles.description: Utgard Castle comes crumbling down as Ymir desperately battles the Titans. Now, Christa must fulfill the promise they made long ago during winter training.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 54 - Hero
articles.description: As Erwin's heroic charge buys Levi time to confront the Beast Titan, Armin comes up with a plan of his own that lays it all on the line.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 59 - The Other Side of the Wall
articles.description: Though it's met with hope and despair, the truth is made public. The Scouts then venture beyond the walls to see if it's everything they dreamed of.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 56 - The Basement
articles.description: The secrets hidden in Grisha's basement await in the ruins of Shiganshina. There, the Scouts hope to find answers to the world worth more than the price they paid.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 57 - That Day
articles.description: A look into Grisha's memories shows Eren the many secrets his father was hiding, including one which led to his mother's demise.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 39 - Pain
articles.description: The Scouts take a stand against a new enemy, but it's not just Titans they'll be fighting anymore.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 37 - Scream
articles.description: Eren's confrontation with a smiling Titan raises questions about his powers, but any answers will come at a cost.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 35 - Children
articles.description: When their group finally flees, Ymir must ask herself whether to lie or stay true to herself, even if it means ruining the lives and future of those she cares about.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 48 - Bystander
articles.description: Having seen a glimpse of his father's memories, Eren attempts to track down a man hoping they might shed some light on his father's secrets.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 29 - Soldier
articles.description: Unarmed and overwhelmed by the Titan assault on the castle, the only hope for the Scouts may lie in a promise and a secret.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 26 - Beast Titan
articles.description: Coupled with the military's cover-up of a previous incident, the shocking discovery inside the wall causes a stir. Elsewhere, while the new Scout recruits are held for observation, a surprising threat appears.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 38 - Smoke Signal
articles.description: After barely surviving Eren's recovery, a rising threat from the shadows puts everyone's lives in danger again.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 52 - Descent
articles.description: Though their Thunder Spears prove effective, the Scouts' celebration is short-lived as disaster descends upon Shiganshina.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 33 - The Hunters
articles.description: Lacking a way to pursue the Titans, Mikasa, Armin, and Hannes reflect on Eren's tenacity and determination as they recover from battle and wait for reinforcements.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 51 - Thunder Spears
articles.description: Against a rush of enemies, the Scouts scramble to defend their horses. But despite falling into a trap, they have their own surprise for the Armored Titan.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 47 - Friends
articles.description: Kenny recalls the life which has brought him to death's door, but he gets to decide whether to live on or not.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 43 - Sin
articles.description: While sins of the past reveal new truths, both sides prepare for the upcoming showdown before they run out of time.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 42 - Reply
articles.description: Erwin pleads his case for the Scouts to be spared, but an unforeseen announcement puts the fate of humanity at risk.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 3 (Russian) - Episode 40 - Old Story
articles.description: Historia and Erwin look back on their past, revealing a shady government with a hidden agenda and inspiration for an uprising.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 32 - Close Combat
articles.description: With a new enemy revealed, Eren and the Scouts fight back using all the techniques at their disposal. However, the Armored and Colossal Titan have other plans in mind.

articles.title: Attack on Titan Season 2 (Russian) - Episode 31 - Warrior
articles.description: Following the battle, the Scouts regroup atop the wall only to find more questions than answers. Before they leave for Trost to get medical attention, Reiner must fulfill what he came to do.
